# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates an item from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Parameters

- **coder**: An unarchiver object.

## Creating items

- **init(title:image:primaryAction:menu:)**: Creates a plain-style item using the specified title, image, primary action, and context menu.
- **init(title:image:target:action:menu:)**: Creates a plain-style item using the specified title, image, target, action, and context menu.
- **init()**: Initializes the item to its default state.
